description:
Sadly, GNOME went and changed things behind the scenes again, and now many extensions like this one (viz. Terminal as Root Button) only make "Error" messages. Logs indicate that the essential commands used to start the app must be changed to something newer.

I hope all you great extension devs find fixes for this quick, because I MISS MY TOPBAR BUTTONS!
get an error when clicking on it
Fails with a blank error notification.

Awesome, just logout and click on your name and enter the password, then don't login yet, slick on the settings icon beside the login button. Select Gnome Xorg instead of the default Gnome (Wayland) display server, then login. Synaptic Package Manager works just like it did a decade ago. Probably best log out of the Xorg desktop and back into the Wayland one afterwards. Hope my review gets you more stars ***** P.S. don't forget to install synaptic in the terminal first. $su Then enter your password $sudo apt-get synaptic That may well be the last time you'll need the terminal in a while...
summary: Perfect shortcut for those who like a GUI for APT

description: no muestra como solucionar el mensaje de error que me arroja...
simplemente le doy y me da error, así que no me sirvió para nada

Donne toute l'information nécessaire pour faire des choix éclairés, notamment en ce qui a trait aux dépendances, aux paquets requis, à l'installation et aux choix des mises à jour (préférences de versions pour éviter les problèmes).
Ceux qui donnent une étoile sont des ignorants ou des gens malhonnêtes.
